    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_78677</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_78677</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Movement of tectonic plates</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewegung der tectonic Platten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mouvement des plats tectoniques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Movimento de placas tectonic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Movimento delle piastre tettoniche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μετακίνηση των τεκτονικών πιάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Movimiento de placas tectónicas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This map shows the movement of tectonic plates. Tectonic plates are broken parts of the Earth's lithosphere composed of the Earth's crust and the upper part of the mantle.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">crust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lithosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">movement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tectonic plates</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">upper mantle</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Karte zeigt die Bewegung der tectonic 
Platten. Tectonic Platten sind unterbrochene Teile der 
Lithoshäre der Masse, die aus der Kruste und dem oberen Teil der 
Masse des Umhangs besteht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette carte montre le mouvement des plats 
tectoniques. Les plats tectoniques sont les parties cassées de 
la lithosphère de la terre composée de croûte et de partie 
supérieure de terre du manteau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este mapa mostra o movimento de placas tectonic. 
As placas tectonic são partes quebradas do lithosphere da terra
composto da crosta e da parte superior de terra do mantle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo programma mostra il movimento delle piastre
tettoniche. Le piastre tettoniche sono parti rotte del litosfera
della terra composto di crosta terrestre e di parte superiore del 
manto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτός ο χάρτης εμφανίζει τη μετακίνηση των τεκτονικών
πιάτων. Τα τεκτονικά πιάτα είναι σπασμένα μέρη γήινο 
lithosphere που αποτελείται από τη γήινη κρούστα και το 
ανώτερο μέρος του μανδύα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta correspondencia muestra el movimiento de 
placas tectónicas. Las placas tectónicas son partes quebradas 
de la litosfera de la tierra integrada por la parte superior de tierra
la corteza y de la capa.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kruste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lithoshäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
